00020 #include <math.h>

00022 const qreal PI        = 3.14159265358979323846f;
00023 const qreal PI_OVER_2 = 1.57079632679489661923f;
00024 const qreal PI_OVER_4 = 0.78539816339744830962f;

00027 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::CPuzzleSpanCreator
00028 ///
00029 /// @description    This is the default class constructor which initializes
00030 ///                 class variables.
00031 /// @pre            None
00032 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.

00037 /// @limitations    None

00041 : QObject(canvas)
00042 {
00043     m_canvas = canvas;
00044     m_isAddingSpan = false;
00045     m_isBidirectional = true;
00046     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00047 
00048     setupActions();
00049     setupMenus();
00050 }

00073 /// @post         None
00074 ///

00086 ///
00087 /// @description  This function is called when the user selects to add a

00090 /// @post         None
00091 ///
00092 /// @limitations  None

00098     m_isBidirectional = false;

00101 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00102 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::addEdgeDone
00103 ///
00104 /// @description   This function is called when the user selects a terminating
00105 ///                point for an edge that is currently being created.
00106 /// @pre           None
00107 /// @post          An edge is created if the terminating point of the edge is
00108 ///                a node other than the first node.
00109 ///
00110 /// @param point:  This is the point where the user clicked to terminate the
00111 ///                edge that is currently being created.
00112 ///
00113 /// @limitations   None
00114 ///
00115 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00116 void CPuzzleSpanCreator::addEdgeDone( const QPoint &point )
00117 {
00118     m_isAddingSpan = false;
00119 
00120     int anchorNode2 = m_model->findNode( point );
00121     if ( anchorNode2 != -1 )
00122     {
00123         m_model->addEdge( m_anchorNode, anchorNode2, m_isBidirectional );
00124     }
00125 
00126     m_canvas->repaint();
00127 }
00128 
00129 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00130 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::angleNorthOfEast
00131 ///
00132 /// @description         This function calculates the angle of a line between
00133 ///                      the two given points.  The angle is given in radians
00134 ///                      with the direction East being 0.  Rotating North gives
00135 ///                      a positive value while rotating South gives a negative
00136 ///                      value.
00137 /// @pre                 None
00138 /// @post                None
00139 ///
00140 /// @param startPoint:   This is the point that the line is originating from.
00141 /// @param endPoint:     This is the point that the line will be going to.
00142 ///
00143 /// @return qreal:       This is the angle in radians of the line going from the
00144 ///                      first node to the second node.  East is considered 0,
00145 ///                      with North being a positive rotation and South a
00146 ///                      negative rotation.
00147 ///
00148 /// @limitations         None
00149 ///
00150 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00151 qreal CPuzzleSpanCreator::angleNorthOfEast( QPoint startPoint,
00152                                             QPoint endPoint )
00153 {
00154     qreal dy = startPoint.y() - endPoint.y();
00155     qreal dx = startPoint.x() - endPoint.x();
00156     qreal angle;
00157     if( dx > 0 )
00158     {
00159         angle = atan(dy/dx);
00160     }
00161     else if( dx < 0 )
00162     {
00163         angle = atan(dy/dx);
00164         angle -= PI;
00165     }
00166     else
00167         angle = (dy>0)?PI_OVER_2:-PI_OVER_2;
00168 
00169     return -angle;
00170 }
00171 
00172 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00173 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::canvasMouseEvent
00174 ///
00175 /// @description   This function handles mouse events and forwards it on to the
00176 ///                appropriate function to be handled, depending on what type
00177 ///                of mouse event it is.
00178 /// @pre           None
00179 /// @post          None
00180 ///
00181 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the mouse event that triggered this
00182 ///                function call.
00183 ///
00184 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the mouse event is used and false otherwise.
00185 ///
00186 /// @limitations   None
00187 ///
00188 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00189 bool CPuzzleSpanCreator::canvasMouseEvent( QMouseEvent *e )
00190 {
00191     switch( e->type() )
00192     {
00193     case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00194         return isAddingSpan();
00195     case QEvent::MouseMove:
00196         setAnchorPoint( e->pos() );
00197         m_canvas->repaint();
00198         return false;
00199     case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00200         if ( isAddingSpan() )
00201         {
00202             addEdgeDone( e->pos() );
00203             return true;
00204         }
00205         else
00206             return false;
00207     default:
00208         return false;
00209     }
00210     return false;
00211 }

00224 ///

00228     return m_nodeAddSpanMenu;
00229 }

00235 ///                added and false otherwise.

00249 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00250 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::paint
00251 ///
00252 /// @description  This function paints any in progress edges.
00253 /// @pre          None
00254 /// @post         Any edge being created is painted to the canvas.
00255 ///
00256 /// @limitations  None
00257 ///
00258 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00259 void CPuzzleSpanCreator::paint()
00260 {
00261     if ( isAddingSpan() )
00262     {
00263         QPainter painter( m_canvas );
00264         QPen pen = m_style->getPen();
00265         pen.setColor( m_style->getNewColor() );
00266         painter.setPen( pen );
00267         painter.setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing);
00268 
00269         painter.drawLine( m_anchorPoint,
00270                           m_model->getNodeAt( m_anchorNode )->s_position );
00271         if ( !m_isBidirectional )
00272             paintArrow( m_model->getNodeAt( m_anchorNode )->s_position,
00273                         m_anchorPoint, &painter );
00274     }
00275 }
00276 
00277 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00278 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::paintArrow
00279 ///
00280 /// @description         This function paints an arrow on the straight edge
00281 ///                      between the two given points, pointing at the second
00282 ///                      point.
00283 /// @pre                 None
00284 /// @post                An arrow is painted on the straight edge pointing to
00285 ///                      the second point.
00286 ///
00287 /// @param nodeFromPos:  This is the point the straight edge begins at.
00288 /// @param nodeToPos:    This is the point the straight edge terminates at.
00289 /// @param painter:      This is a pointer to the QPainter which will paint the
00290 ///                      edge.
00291 ///
00292 /// @limitations         None
00293 ///
00294 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00295 void CPuzzleSpanCreator::paintArrow( QPoint anchorPoint, QPoint endPoint,
00296                                      QPainter *painter )
00297 {
00298     QMatrix backupMatrix = painter->matrix();
00299 
00300     QPen editPen = painter->pen();
00301     int d = m_style->getNodeRadius() * 2;
00302 
00303     painter->translate( endPoint );
00304     painter->rotate( -angleNorthOfEast( anchorPoint, endPoint )*180/PI );
00305 
00306     editPen.setCapStyle( Qt::SquareCap );
00307     painter->drawLine( 0, 0, (int)(d*.25),  (int)(d*.25) );
00308     painter->drawLine( 0, 0, (int)(d*.25), -(int)(d*.25) );
00309 
00310     painter->setMatrix( backupMatrix );
00311 }
00312 
00313 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00314 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::setAnchorNode
00315 ///
00316 /// @description  This function sets the node which the edge being created is
00317 ///               originally anchored to as a start point.
00318 /// @pre          None
00319 /// @post         The anchor node is set.
00320 ///
00321 /// @param node:  This is the index to the anchor node.
00322 ///
00323 /// @limitations  None
00324 ///
00325 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00326 void CPuzzleSpanCreator::setAnchorNode( int node )
00327 {
00328     m_anchorNode = node;
00329     if ( m_anchorNode != -1 )
00330         setAnchorPoint( m_model->getNodeAt( m_anchorNode )->s_position );
00331 }
00332

00334 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::setAnchorPoint
00335 ///
00336 /// @description   This function sets the end anchor point for the new edge
00337 ///                being created.

00340 ///
00341 /// @param point:  This is the point where the user currently has the mouse, to
00342 ///                indicate the current end point of the edge being drawn.
00343 ///
00344 /// @limitations   None
00345 ///
00346 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00347 void CPuzzleSpanCreator::setAnchorPoint( const QPoint &point )
00348 {
00349     m_anchorPoint = point;
00350 }

00369 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00370 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::setupActions
00371 ///
00372 /// @description  This function creates and initializes the QActions used by the
00373 ///               add span menu.
00374 /// @pre          None
00375 /// @post         The add span menu actions are created and initialized.
00376 ///
00377 /// @limitations  None
00378 ///
00379 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00380 void CPuzzleSpanCreator::setupActions()
00381 {
00382     m_newBidirectionalAction = new QAction( tr( "Bidirectional" ), this );
00383     connect( m_newBidirectionalAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00384              SLOT( addBidirectionalEdge() ) );
00385 
00386     m_newDirectionalAction = new QAction( tr( "Directional" ), this );
00387     connect( m_newDirectionalAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00388              SLOT( addDirectionalEdge() ) );
00389 }
00390 
00391 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00392 /// CPuzzleSpanCreator::setupMenus
00393 ///
00394 /// @description  This function creates and initializes the add span menu.
00395 /// @pre          None
00396 /// @post         The add span menu is created and initialized.
00397 ///
00398 /// @limitations  None
00399 ///
00400 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00401 void CPuzzleSpanCreator::setupMenus()
00402 {
00403     m_nodeAddSpanMenu = new QMenu( "Add Edge", m_canvas );
00404     m_nodeAddSpanMenu->addAction( m_newBidirectionalAction );
00405     m_nodeAddSpanMenu->addAction( m_newDirectionalAction );
00406 }
